author: A_Brickset_user
title: Zany Chess!
review:
This is not the computer's chess program! You can play with Pirates or Western theme boards and men; plus they beat each other up during a battle!  Everytime a man is captured, a Capture short is played, in which the two men will perform a LEGO interpretation of Roadrunner/Wile.E. Coyote/Bugs Bunny/Elmer Fudd.  
   It has beautiful music in it, and the boards and locations are each different.  It also has a Campaign Mode, in which you watch movies that lead into a series of chess games,with you as white.  My favorite are the Pirates, yet even though the movies are Pirates against Soldiers/Armada, the pieces are pirates and soldiers on each side.  Why not Pirate vs. Soldiers?

author: A_Brickset_user
title: good
review:
i like it, the lego king is very nice, in story mode the lego scenes are very good(when the sheriff is going to capture the thiefs, or when you are in your ship and captain roger appears in his ship..etc) but the cartoons when you capture other piece are TERRIBLE! ARGGGGGGGGGG! i think this is because that game is destined to childs, but childs are not necessary stupid... and the pieces are pirates and soldiers on each side, and in western mode are indians and american soldiers(when the bad guys are thiefs and the good guys are the sheriff and fortress soldiers, but indians are not very important in this story)

you can learn to play chess in a good level with that game

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Gear (Video Games/PC) - LEGO Chess Review
review:
This game is a great game for any chess fan. This videogame has scenes from 3 different themes: Western, Pirates and a scene based on the regular chess game. There're also lot's of cool videos during the games. This videogame also allows two players to join the game.

Pros

  • Includes scenes fron themes like Western and Pirates
  • Videos during the game

Cons

  • None

Summary

All in all it's a great game to get and I would HIGHLY recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure.

author: PCGamer97
title: An okay game.
review: A nice game, but it wasn't my most favorite. I never really got into it. I like this game for the fact they took chess to a new level... LEGO STYLE! :) I wished I got the limited edition king on his throne piece...
